arts.ttl: New Balance Back in the Kit Game - Sign Leverkusen and Atalanta
arts.sum: New Balance seems determined to get back into the football kit game as they will become the shirt maker for two new big teams in the 25-26 season, Bayer Leverkusen and Atalanta.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen fear Terrier has suffered serious injury: "A slap in the face"
arts.sum: Martin Terrier suffered another injury setback on Saturday - and it doesn't look good for the Bayer Leverkusen forward.

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz shines as Bayer Leverkusen stroll past Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen players celebrate after Patrik Schick's goal, which sealed their victory - INA FASSBENDER Florian Wirtz of Leverkusen dribbles past Julian Weigl of Gladbach, showcasing his skill on the ball - INA FASSBENDER

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Bayer Leverkusen 3-1 Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: After Bayern Munich’s 3-2 win against Wolfsburg, Bayer Leverkusen comprehensively beat Borussia Mönchengladbach 3-1 on Saturday evening. The first 45 was all Leverkusen, apart from an early effort from Rocco…

arts.ttl: Wirtz bags brace as in-form Leverkusen march on
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz found the net twice and set up a third as Bayer Leverkusen beat Borussia Mönchengladbach 3-1.

arts.ttl: What has defending champions Bayer Leverkusen back in title-chasing form?
arts.sum: "I know he was great in the season before I came to Leverkusen," said Alonso referring to Schick's 24-goal Bundesliga campaign of 2021/24. For all their increased defensive solidity, Leverkusen have still only kept three clean sheets this season - they had as many in the first seven games of 2023/24 - but they are scoring enough goals at the opposite end for it not to matter too much.

arts.ttl: Preview: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Bayer Leverkusen and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz named Bundesliga Player of the Month
arts.sum: The DFL have named Bayer Leverkusen’s Florian Wirtz as the Bundesliga’s Player of the Month for December, beating Paul Nebel (Mainz), Mitchell Weiser (Werder Bremen), Nick Woltemade (Stuttgart), Jamal Musiala…
